${ModID}:Demolish.NAME: Demolish
${ModID}:Demolish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Add a *Loose *Brick into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Crenellations.NAME: Crenellations
${ModID}:Crenellations.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:LeaningTower.NAME: Leaning Tower
${ModID}:LeaningTower.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Startup: At the end of !${ModID}:m2! turns, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:PerfectedBrick.NAME: Perfected Brick
${ModID}:PerfectedBrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for ALL your ${ModID}:Bricks.

${ModID}:Jenga.NAME: Jenga
${ModID}:Jenga.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn gain !M! Strength and Exhaust a random ${ModID}:Brick. NL If you can't exhaust a brick, die.

${ModID}:BrickGolem.NAME: Brick Golem
${ModID}:BrickGolem.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Gain !M! Metallicize. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Artifact. NL Pickup: Obtain 2 *Heavy *Brick.

${ModID}:Salvage.NAME: Salvage
${ModID}:Salvage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a ${ModID}:Brick, gain !M! Vigor.
